column4: hey i need some help with fiesty and the ndivia drivers. i have a gtx. could someone point me to the right channel
is your card one of the 8 series (ie. dx10 compatible)?
lol, that happened to me too. lemme guess, x11 error on ubuntu startup?

i had that problem with my 8800 gts. i used http://www.albertomilone.com/nvidia_scripts1.html after futzing about for a whole weekend and then it worked. dunno if it'll work right away though; i had to do a lot of tweaking beforehand
